computer.title: Lenovo Yoga AIO 7 27" 4K UHD Touchscreen All-in-One Desktop (AMD Ryzen 7 5800H/16GB/1TB SSD/Win 11/Office 2021/AMD Radeon RX6600M 8GB GDDR6/100% sRGB/5MP IR Camera/2x5W JBL Speakers/Rotating Display)
about: Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H | Speed: 3.2 GHz (Base) - 4.4 GHz (Max) | 8 Cores | 4MB L2/ 16MB L3 Cache
Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600M 8GB GDDR6 graphics
Display: 27-inch 4K UHD (3840x2160) | Brightness: 360nits | 100% sRGB | IPS Display
OS and Software: Pre-Loaded Windows 11 Home with Lifetime Validity | MS Office Home and Student 2021
Memory and Storage: 16GB DDR4-3200 RAM, expandable up to 32GB | Storage: 1TB SSD
Camera (Built in): 5.0MP IR Camera with Facial Recognition
Audio: 2 x 5W JBL Brand Speakers | HD Audio | Dual Microphone
Ports: 3 x USB 3.2, 3 x USB 2.0, Ethernet (RJ-45), HDMI-out 2.0, 3.5mm jack | Without CD-Drive
In The Box: All-in-One, Euterpe Wireless Keyboard, Euterpe Wireless Mouse, Power Adapter, User Manual
Warranty: This genuine Lenovo All-in-One comes with 3 Year Onsite Warranty
